text: kani evadaite ila ceyaledo, atadu tana bharyanu takaka mundu, rendu nelalu varusaga upavasamundali. Idi kuda ceyaleni vadu, aravai mandi nirupedalaku bhojanam pettali. Idanta miru allah nu mariyu ayana pravaktanu drdhanga visvasincataniki. Mariyu ivi allah nirnayincina haddulu. Mariyu satyatiraskarulaku badhakaramaina siksa padutundi
